text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationMode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PHYSICALphysical presenceParticipation by direct action where subject and actor are in the same location. (The participation involves more than communication.)
    REMOTEremote presenceParticipation by direct action where subject and actor are in separate locations, and the actions of the actor are transmitted by electronic or mechanical means. (The participation involves more than communication.)
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ParticipationModeVerbal
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ParticipationModeWritten
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ParticipationModeElectronicData
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-xPhysicalVerbalParticipationMode

name: ParticipationMode
title: ParticipationMode
description: Identifies the primary means by which an Entity participates in an Act.
